ActJudges Act
SubjectElaine Drossos ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Nicholas A. Drossos **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to ELAINE DROSSOS, survivor of the Hon. Nicholas A. Drossos, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective November 14, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
